ing: 1/2 teaspoon garlic salt, or more to taste
des: "Odd but delicious version of garlicky goodness that tastes great! There is no way to go wrong with this, you just have to love garlic as much as I do. Adjust to your tastes! The wonderful thing about popcorn is that it is so versatile!"
ins: Pop popcorn in a air popper according to manufacturer's instructions; transfer to a large bowl. Drizzle butter over popcorn; stir to evenly coat. Sprinkle Parmesan cheese, garlic salt, and rosemary over popcorn; toss to coat.
